subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Ben Curtis and Boo Weekley are going to the P.G.A. Championship at Whistling Straits in Sheboygan, Wis., despite falling from the top 100 in the world ranking.
snippet: Ben Curtis and Boo Weekley are going to the P.G.A. Championship at Whistling Straits in Sheboygan, Wis., despite falling from the top 100 in the world ranking.
